actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT COALESCE((
    SELECT Week_Actual
    FROM (
      SELECT Week_Actual, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY Weeks DESC) AS WeekNumber
      FROM KPI_Week_Task
      WHERE Weeks <= 'Week 13' AND Week_Actual IS NOT NULL
    ) AS subquery
    WHERE WeekNumber = 1
  ), 0) AS Last_Week_Actual,
  SUM(Week_Target) AS Total_Week_Target
FROM KPI_Week_Task
WHERE Weeks <= 'Week 13';
